column2: Order Ofela Soulcleave to leave the field.

<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a turret that fires rockets. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.

Usable by any character, this pack comes with everything you need to take the wild frontier by storm.

Appearance skins override the look of your equipment and have no stats of their own.
<c=@abilitytype>Turret.</c> Build a rifle turret that shoots at foes. This turret overcharges when it is first placed.
